Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook

Class Notebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook.Notebook
  • public class Notebook
extends java.lang.Object
    Notebook class for WolfTasks, this is a Notebook that is comprised of TaskLists that have Tasks.
    Author:
    Mason Morano, Inyene Etuk

      • editTask

        public void editTask​(int idx,
                     java.lang.String taskName,
                     java.lang.String description,
                     boolean recurring,
                     boolean active)
        Edits a task with a new set of parameters that belong to a Task object
        Parameters:
        idx - the index of the task to edit in currentTaskList
        taskName - the name of a Task to create
        description - the description of a Task
        recurring - whether or not a task is Recurring
        active - whether or not a task is Active
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - for invalid task
